original_title: 『ORANGE RANGE LIVE TOUR 016-017 ~おかげさまで15周年! 47都道府県 DE カーニバル~ at 日本武道館』
overview: Orange Range's 15 year anniversary tour that they played through all 47 prefectures. This concert was performed at the Nippon Budokan.
title: Orange Range Live Tour 016-017 Okagesamade 15 Shunen! 47 Tokoden De Carnival At Nippon Budokan
